LanguageData.DMS_Furnace.label: sintering furnace
LanguageData.DMS_Furnace.description: A massive industrial equipment use to create an ultra-high temperature environment in a closed space to sinter alloy or ceramics. can also smelt metal.
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorCycleComplete.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorFormed.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorForming.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechGestatorSamll.label: automatroid constructor
LanguageData.DMS_MechGestatorSamll.description: A massive industrial equipment use to assemble automatroid.
LanguageData.DMS_ReactionChamber.label: pressure chamber
LanguageData.DMS_ReactionChamber.description: A massive industrial equipment use to create a high-pressure environment to cause materials to react together.
LanguageData.DMS_TableArtifuscle.label: artifuscle chamber
LanguageData.DMS_TableArtifuscle.description: High-end production equipment for cultivating artifuscle and bionic.
LanguageData.DMS_TableMachinePrinter.label: machinery printer
LanguageData.DMS_TableMachinePrinter.description: a composite metal printer, which can manufacture and assemble metal products and weapons through cold forging to mass-produce machinery.
